definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

sentences.english: They can always write their local languages in the Roman characters.
sentences.chinese: 他們大可用羅馬字母來書寫他們的土語。

sentences.english: This review of Roman calligraphy letters shows you exactly how to create your letters.
sentences.chinese: 這種書法羅馬字母的審查表明你到底如何創建你的信。

sentences.english: Sputnik"is an example of a Russian word which has been transliterated into Roman script. " Sputnik"
sentences.chinese: 便是用羅馬字母拼寫俄文單詞的一個例子。
